snippet.title: Summer Shopping List for Big Spenders
snippet.description:
Summer Shopping List for Big Spenders
By Jason Notte 08:16 AM EDT 05/27/10
Forget boring gas grills and trips to the local beach. Here's a list of luxury toys and tours -- including an outdoor pizza oven and a spin around the Tour de France -- that will make your summer sizzle.
